monster.attr: Undead Fortitude - if zombie reduced to 0 HP, it makes a con save of DC 5+damage taken, unless radiant or from a critical hit. On success, zombie drops to 1 hp; Explode - If the zombie drops to 0 hp, it explodes in a violent mass of diseased flesh. Every creature within 15 feet must make a DC 14 Dex saving throw. On failure, they take 4d6 necrotic damage and are poisoned for a minute. Half damage on save and are not poisoned.
